title: The Chelsea Flower Show (Captioned)
brief_description: It was in 1913 that the Royal Horticultural Society moved its Great Spring Show from the Temple Gardens to the Royal Chelsea Hospital. This commemorative video looks back over the last 75 golden years and illustrates this fascinating history with period photographs, film and music. Rated: G
